website_summaries.verdict: This stylish table looks more expensive than it actually is.
pros: The glass legs give this table a charming floating effect, and the tempered glass surface looks great
For a less expensive modern coffee table, this is an excellent choice
cons: The tempered glass surface can be difficult to clean

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: First, can't believe it was well under $100; would definitely pay more for it. Second, extremely easy to put together. Third, it's GORGEOUS. The reviews didn't lie. I bought it for my counseling office. In some of my sessions, I catch myself staring at it thinking about how great it is. Also it's the easiest coffee table ever to vacuum around/under. Something I never thought about before, but turns out that's a small thing in life that'll make you happy.
customer_reviews.author: holland1945Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Expensive looking coffee table for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this coffee table. It looks so much more expensive than it is and is very easy to put together. So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen M

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore this table...i kept going back and forth between this table amd a higher peiced one and I'm so glad I went with this one! It is gorgeous and modern. I love the glossy top and glass legs. It goes well with the matching glossy console table. Everyone loves it and asks where I purchased it from. It looks elegant and more expensive than what it actually costs. I couldn't be happier with my purchase. The stated dimensions were accurate and it's the perfect size for my narrow living room.
customer_reviews.author: Cityvi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product...
customer_reviews.text: I’m an extreme minimalist and love this table. Modern, very easy to assemble without any tools and looks like it cost double what I paid. Arrived without a single scratch on it from Kentucky to California. An absolute bargain! Ignore the 1 star whiners. They are the type of people that complain about everything. To avoid disappointment, expect Target quality and nothing higher.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty good, easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty good, easy to put together. Everyone that comes over thinks I spent twice as much as I did on these peaces. That said, to me it's clear that it's a fake -- would of liked to see some more effort in trying to separate the wood, instead, it just looks a bit like poster-board stretched over the top. Overall, for the price - I say this is a great buy, it will add an extra spark to your place and if you buy the set, it all flows well. But upon deeper inspection, it's mask becomes apparent and can be bothersome.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Jameson

customer_reviews.title: No brainer
customer_reviews.text: Honesly, I read the reviews, bought the thing and I couldn't be happier. It is a traditional coffee table with a non traditional look. I love it. I love it. I love it! It is high quality and well made. I got the white one and it completed the look of my living room. Putting it together took no time and was pretty straightforward. Shipping was fast. Nothing to complain about.
customer_reviews.author: nmoham

customer_reviews.title: BEST MINEY SPENT SO FAR!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG THIS IS WELL WORTH THE MONEY!! GO AHEAD ON AND BUY IT. Got my table shipped in only two days! I’m 7 months pregnant and was able to easily sit down and put it up by myself. Took about twenty min. It’s as easy as screwing screws into table,with provided small tools. Table is smooth,glam,sheek and very sturdy. The shine is beautiful. Tbh this table is worth way more than the price. I’m so excited with my choice!! I can’t stop looking at it. I will be ordering matching end tables by the end of this week. Don’t pass this deal up.
customer_reviews.author: Romexoxo

customer_reviews.title: Great dual-purpose table
customer_reviews.text: This coffee table is great! I was looking for something to use both as a coffee table and as a play table for an occasional 2-year-old visitor to do his projects, and this will work perfectly, and at a very reasonable price. As someone else commented (I think), the glass sides are wonderful. I thought I was going to have to change my not-very-big area rug because the coffee table would cover too much of it, but with the glass sides, that's not a problem. The visual pattern of the whole rug shows quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Sue C.

customer_reviews.title: Classy Coffee Table
customer_reviews.text: This table is modern, simple, and classy. Looks more expensive than it is with the thick glass panels as legs. It was well-packed (in perfect shape) and easy to put together (no 4 letter words coming out of hubby’s mouth). Love it!
customer_reviews.author: M. Petras

customer_reviews.title: Classy coffee table that doesn't break the bank
customer_reviews.text: This coffee table can't be beat for the price! Super easy to put together, looks gorgeous, and a lot bigger than it looks. I've had this for about a year, if you move it a ton then you're going to have to tighten the bolts every once in a while because the screws can get loose. Other than that, this is the perfect coffee table! It looks great with their bookcase!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous statement piece
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite buys. It's gorgeous. I love love love the look of it in person. And the size is great, I was expecting a smaller table but was amazed at how large it is. Don't hesitate, but it.
customer_reviews.author: GlamourGirl@heart

customer_reviews.title: A hassle but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table but NOT and I repeat NOT easy to put together. You’ll need two people because the parts are heavy and the nails are short. More than likely you’ll have to request more screws because you’ll be missing some (I found it out that as soon as I opened the package, a flyer for missing parts came out). Good quality though
customer_reviews.author: QPensive

customer_reviews.title: What a deal, great quality and just Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS FINISH, SO ON TREND! Interior Designer Pick, this coffee table is amazing and so easy to assemble. My interior design client LOVED IT TOO!
customer_reviews.author: Glen C. Kinnaird

customer_reviews.title: Looks so expensive for under $100.00.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second coffee table I have ordered. The first one was about 3 years ago (the wood one also in pics) and it’s still holding up perfect. I just love these! They look so expensive for under $100.00.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Staup

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to assemble alone.
customer_reviews.text: Table was minorly damaged upon receipt, but still decided to assimilate, nonetheless. However, it quickly became apparent that although only six screws need to be threaded into their respective attachment pieces, this is impossible for one person to do alone. With three screws for each side, plus 2 spacers for each screw, all this has to be held in place while each srew is tightened individually. This cannot be done assembling alone, and maybe not even with two people.
customer_reviews.author: Adam P

customer_reviews.title: sweet!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Highly recommended! FedEx actually delivered it damaged. That was a fail. However, Cymax quickly rectified the issue and shipped me another table. Kudos to Cymax and kudos to the product, as it is of high quality and I highly recommend if you are going for a retro/modern look. Well worth the price. I ended up ordering the tv media center and nesting tables I loved the product so much!
customer_reviews.author: LoTuZ

customer_reviews.title: Looks as good as the image
customer_reviews.text: Great look for a modern decor. Appropriately packaged to prevent damage to the glass, however, the table top arrived with minor cosmetic damage to two of the corners. The table is subject to shifting under lateral loads due to the side mounting of the glass panes. However, this deficiency is very minor and would not impact my decision to purchase the product.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Coffee table
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about receiving the coffee table but didn’t know what it would look like in person. The product exceeded my expectations! The table is so beautiful. It’s sturdy and solid in a great way. Looks way more expensive than the price. Matches perfect with my decor. Well made table! So happy I purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and looks great
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with our table. It's sturdy enough to put your feet up on it. I love how it looks and the glass is nice and thick. I suggest you get some coasters to not destroy the surface with cup rings, but even before we bought any, the table seemed fine without them.
customer_reviews.author: Grant R.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged!!
customer_reviews.text: It's damaged!!!!!!!!!!!!!🖓 Sucks because your new table doesn't look new, and it takes away the presence of quality. Disappointed 🖓🖓🖓🖓🖓🖓🖓
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular
customer_reviews.text: You won’t believe the quality of this table for $100. Constant compliments from guests it looks much more expensive. I’ve bought this table and the matching side tables 3 of my Airbnb properties
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Just Awesome 😍
customer_reviews.text: We could not believe our eyes when we put this together! First it was easy to built and second the quality of this table it’s amazing! Looks 4 times the actual price! We’re in love! Thank you so much! Just awesome 😍
customer_reviews.author: Rubie Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Nice construction
customer_reviews.text: I bought the TV stand first and liked it so much I followed up with the table. Because the sides are transparent, it's visibly very light and great for a small space. Also it was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amelielucia

customer_reviews.title: Looks high end
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleasantly surprised at how great this table looks. Great value for the $$$
customer_reviews.author: abby1204

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Love this table. Love the illusion of floating. It looks fantastic in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Classy and practical. It looks much more expensive than it really is. Recommended if you are looking for a simple and classy coffee table. Easy to assemble. It took me around 10 min.
customer_reviews.author: Abdallah

customer_reviews.title: Sleek
customer_reviews.text: Very nice design at great price. I put this in my cocktail loung at home and my guests always compliment the style
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: A BEAUTIFUL peice to add to any room
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to assemble and BEAUTIFUL. It allows an open space to remain open space.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Howard

customer_reviews.title: Looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Came pretty much exactly as is pictured. Pretty easy to put together, took 20 minutes or so to unpack and assemble alone, maybe faster with an extra set of hands, it's basically just 6 bolts. Color looks as pictured. Not real wood but for the price it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Nate W.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, looks great, good price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee table! It looks way more expensive than it is and I get tons of compliments on it (included one from an interior designer). It's very sturdy and does not scratch easily. Checks pretty much all the boxes of a good coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly , good price and modern look
customer_reviews.text: The table is great , looks really modern yet simple and easy to assemble. Only PROBLEM I had was the paint finish. Mine was missing some clear coat , so it’s not as glossy 😑
customer_reviews.author: Irwin c

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks like the picture with a glossy top and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Table
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!!! Easy to clean and everything. Goes right with my all white futon.
customer_reviews.author: malik

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this table is nice, but unfortunately where the sides of the table come together at the top there are these clear bubbles that make it look cheap. Have to return it, otherwise it’s ok...
customer_reviews.author: s k s

customer_reviews.title: Must buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Don't hesitate to buy it, is really beautiful. Very easy assembly and great contemporary/minimalist look.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Brito

customer_reviews.title: Looks expensive be mindful of sharp corners
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Need 2 people to set up. It looks great, it's sturdy and the corners are sharp so it wouldn't be suitable for a home with small children.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee table, would have happily paid mroe
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't expecting much when ordering a coffee table off of amazon, but this arrived in perfect condition (no dents on the corners like others have said) and looks great in our living room. We get complements on it all the time and it definitely looks like it's worth more than the $85 I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: codeblue11

customer_reviews.title: I love that table
customer_reviews.text: I love that table! Really stable. I was first worried the glass could possibly break, but it’s so heavy. I once accidentally stood on it when the smoke detector went off and I had to turn it off. You can also easily assembled it by yourself. No second person needed if you’re a little bit handy.
customer_reviews.author: dz

customer_reviews.title: Yas Queen!
customer_reviews.text: This coffee table makes me swoon! Every time I look at it in my living room I just smile, it's exactly what I wanted. Easy to put together and easy to clean. It's perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ross

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table! It was a bit tricky to put together by myself, but I managed with a little help from my 9 yr old. ;) I didn't find it too heavy to lift into place afterwards, but then again, I'm always heaving my 75 lb kid around!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine HudgensTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Bolts were not the same size and some were too short!
customer_reviews.text: This product looks elegant and beautiful in my living room, but I received a table top with a hairline crack. In addition to that, the bolts provided were varying in length and 2 out of the 6 bolts provided were too short! I had to remove both plastic and metal washer for the bolts and cap to make contact and tighten. This obviously makes the table more unstable than it should be. I would be willing to give this product 5 stars even with the hairline crack if the seller sends me replacement assembly bolts that actually fit.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Coffee table fits perfectly in front of L ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Coffee table fits perfectly in front of L shaped couch. Bought the white top as it matches my Fireplace TV stand. It was a little difficult to get the screws to catch when putting together, however, it was worth the aggravation once the installation was completed.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S

customer_reviews.title: Delivered damaged and not happy at all
customer_reviews.text: Every photo that I saw in the reviews made me feel confident in ordering the product and I ordered the entertainment center and bookshelf as well! I open the box to put together the table and find that it is DAMAGED and it is really disappointing considering the other two pieces came in just fine. I don’t want to have to go through the return process with such a large item and being a single mom having to put the pieces together is hard enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn S

customer_reviews.title: NOT LIKE NEW!
customer_reviews.text: Damage al over the table top. Absolutely not as described. Very disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: Muti007

customer_reviews.title: Damaged but beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Really cool looking tables with heavy glass but i had the tabletop arrive with a crushed and peeling corner. I'm trying to figure out how to get a replacement tabletop without having to box up and ship the entire heavy table back. If it wasn't for the problems with the corner I would give 5 stars for the look of the tables. They are unique and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Blueswank

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table. Fairly easy to put together. May need a hand to hold glass in place while another screw it together. I manage to do it alone. Goes well with my other piece,just slightly darker.
customer_reviews.author: token storr

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Showed my boyfriend this and he was immediately sold. The whole set looks great but we aren't accustomed to buying furniture online so we only purchased the table and I'm ready for the rest of the set now! Only wish is if it were bigger other than that LOVE it. Very clean, glossy, and chic. Arrived in tact and the bf said the assembly was a cinch.
customer_reviews.author: Elysia Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased with how the coffee table looks! I would advise that you have a second person helping when assembling the coffee table. It was challenging for one person. The instructions were also, a little vague!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryne

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy very easy to assemble I love this so much so elegant only downfall is that it’s very short under my knees so if you don’t have a short couch it won’t be good but it works for me I love it !
customer_reviews.author: Kaelie Dill

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table, We love our table but if you have pets be careful as they walk/run into the the glass as they cannot see it. This table is clear and appears to be floating in the living space ,lovely table :) My hubby had no problems when assembling our table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its whatever
customer_reviews.text: I haven't assembled it yet but right out of the box you can tell its cheaply made. The material is glued on incorrectly. Theres open corners. See pics.
customer_reviews.author: A+

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Super high quality. The plastic that goes underneath the glass came broken, I ordered a replacement but that fell out of the packaging on the way here. Don't mind it since you can't see its broken on top of carpet and it still does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Loading

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful modern looking table
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful modern looking table. It was a little challenging to assemble myself but then again I am not very handy. Took me about 35 mins. If i had someone to help it would have taken me 15. You are getting a very modern and elegantly designed table for a great price. I've gotten many compliments on the table and love it. It has really classed up my room :)
customer_reviews.author: MrW

customer_reviews.title: Great center table
customer_reviews.text: It looks awesome and its beutefull, every one loves it thank you
customer_reviews.author: R. Dzaghgouni

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table. Nice thick glass.
customer_reviews.text: I love my table. Easy to ready instructions. Very sturdy and heavy glass. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, and that's about all.
customer_reviews.text: Table top arrived copied on the edges. To heavy and cumbersome to even attempt to return. Looks nice, but is more of a showpiece and not functional. Dissapointed to spend so much on such a subpar product.
customer_reviews.author: K.M.

customer_reviews.title: Super disappointed when it came
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed when it came. Several corners are broken. And the screw doesn't stick together very well. Doesn't worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Vera Jiang

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: We love our coffee table. It fits beautifully in our living room and is extremely easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Elayne

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute coffee table. Very easy to assemble. It's not that big, so putting in front of a big sofa may not be a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: siamak javadi

customer_reviews.title: perfect coffee table that stands out
customer_reviews.text: This looks way better in person and it was larger than expected in terms of its length. The assembly was a walk in the park and the instruction sheet can be a bit more informational, though it is not required as it is simple to put together
customer_reviews.author: kar2ram

customer_reviews.title: Elegant table with sharp edges
customer_reviews.text: modem, simple and elegant, easy to assemble, but the edges are very sharp. If you have kids, don't buy it, I am afraid it will hurt someone by accident.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: This table is beautiful! I love it
customer_reviews.text: This table is beautiful! I love it! I think the screws could be a tad bit longer. It made it a little difficult in putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Tashia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: While i ended up buying something else. This table was decent and as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: FI

customer_reviews.title: ... have as a coffee table and I couldn't be happier. Not only did it come very fast
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this table to have as a coffee table and I couldn't be happier. Not only did it come very fast, but the assembly was SO EASY! The glass is nice and sturdy and the table once put together gives a very sleek, modern look. It even comes with floor guards that you slip on where the glass meets the floor to prevent any chipping or friction if you need to move it for cleaning purposes, etc. AWESOME BUY! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: The table work great in my space. However, it does scratch pretty easily but you can only see the marks in certain lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah reilly

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Directions arent clear but if you have common sense its easy! Bigger than I expected which is great not too big. Looks very modern and is stirdy. Definitely would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly stylish, but a bit damaged
customer_reviews.text: I love the table. It is sturdy, very stylish and looks much more expensive. However the corner of it is a bit damaged. I will be contacting Amazon to ask for a replacement. I would give it 5 stars, but because of a damage it is only 3.
customer_reviews.author: Yana

customer_reviews.title: Excelent product.
customer_reviews.text: Look exactly as pictured. Used as a cocktail table in front of sofa. It may be inexpensive, but looks very well. Easy to put together, Delivered as promised, well packaged, without any damage. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but it came damaged 😫!!
customer_reviews.text: The coffee table is beautiful, but like the other buyers it came damaged ☹️ Which is VERY noticeable, can’t hide the damages.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Ascencio

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions are wrong
customer_reviews.text: Dimensions state table is 44×32×16. True dimensions are 44×22×16! Ten inches makes a difference! But the table is so darn good looking, GREAT quality, and you cannot beat the price. If it were the correct size I would give it 5 stars. That's how great the quality and look are. P.s. I bought a entertainment center and this table from Monarch. The packaging was awesome on both! The boxes were safely wrapped in bubble wrap, and had no damage at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and it pulls the room together beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with the table. I think it looks great in my living room. Keep in mind that even though the table is light in weight, I found it rather difficult to assemble. It's quite the task getting the screws, washers, and other parts lined up. I would recommend having a second person help.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it, easy to assemble. Arrived quickly, looks great, and seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: I love this table
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. It looks very high end at a very reasonable cost. Very sturdy and easy to assemble. I've got many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: randomlyboolean

customer_reviews.title: Modern/Beautiful/Affordable!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I ordered this Tuesday night and received it Thursday. It was packed super safe and made it so so easy to assemble. This table is so modern and beautiful I’m very happy I went with it. 100/10 for me. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos morrobel

customer_reviews.title: This looks very good. I was a little nervous to buy it ...
customer_reviews.text: This looks very good. I was a little nervous to buy it but I am very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Soto

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easy to setup and sizeable enough. Good buy! Update! The nuts that holds the glass onto the table became very loose after a while and the table kept falling down. Had to take it down for our safety.
customer_reviews.author: CO

customer_reviews.title: perfect so
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly as on pics. Stylish, simple, elegant . 3 months of use now... perfect so far
customer_reviews.author: AMAL’ ASTAN

customer_reviews.title: Shorter than expected but nice quality product
customer_reviews.text: This table is really nice and is actually really good quality with both the glass and the wooden top. However, it is way shorter than expected and basically as tall as an ottoman. Thats why i gave it 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Mey

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this table! Its beautiful and was quick to put together. It was bigger than anticipated but I love it. Very happy with purchase! Edit// Still pretty happy with it only downside is it does scratch easily (definitely need coasters) and if you happen to spill anything near the edges it gets kinda stuck between the pieces you use to attach the glass to the table itself, which is a pain to clean. But overall I still love it! Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Andi Pandi

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, cheap construction.
customer_reviews.text: The top is a laminated wood, it is not solid. The table looks nice, but we're also in danger of some bowing in in middle due to misaligned drill holes from the manfacturer.
customer_reviews.author: @mattbova

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described/pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described/pictured. An inexpensive piece that fits my need. Note----while I assembled it myself, a second set of hands would make things much easier.
customer_reviews.author: KELLY D MURPHY

customer_reviews.title: easy to put together and lift
customer_reviews.text: i really it and so do my guest. easy to put together and lift. was a bit chipped but that might of been from the delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Yensy A.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my daughter. She put it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter. She put it together almost immediately. She loves it and wants matching end tables, so I guess I'll be looking for matching end tables....
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: The table itself is great, if you can manage to have them send ...
customer_reviews.text: The table itself is great, if you can manage to have them send you one without damage. My first order had the top cracked in half and the replacement has a warped corner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was super easy to put together and it looks great
customer_reviews.text: It was super easy to put together and it looks great. The only complaint that I would have, would be that the top had a few scuff marks, which I can't get out.
customer_reviews.author: Portia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with it. Heavy, sturdy, modern, easy to assemble. Perfect addition to my living room
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: A steal for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this table. It's very contemporary and just what I was looking for. It's sturdy and the glass sides make the table take up less space visually. I also love that it appears to be "floating" because of the glass sides. Very easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly I found it nice for my house I like it and recommended for everyone
customer_reviews.author: aziz

customer_reviews.title: Modern and Sleek
customer_reviews.text: It is great product. Purchased it about 2 months before for my living room. Was easy to put together (10 min tops), looks very sleek and modern. Colors are just right fit for me. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Raytx

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking but the top is easily to leave marks.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Le

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing
customer_reviews.text: The clear sides make the table almost look like it's floating. It's really great because it creates a delicate look instead of bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Christina R

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table! It arrive early and was packaged very secure. It was easy to assemble. It goes very well with my white leather sofa!
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table
customer_reviews.text: This table is so beautiful! It looks so much more expensive than what it was. I also purchased the matching tv stand and together they are lovely.
customer_reviews.author: ciara

customer_reviews.title: Surprising buy!
customer_reviews.text: It's a lovely table. I didn't expect that it would be this easy to assemble. It's a tab bit low but that's ok. I've been looking for a coffee table for a while now, and finally decided this was the one as it is sleek and classy!
customer_reviews.author: Rohan Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Amazing table! Great quality and fast shipping! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Iryna Gusak

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I love this table but it arrived damaged. I waiting to see what the seller is going to do .
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Shopper

customer_reviews.title: i love
customer_reviews.text: i ordered the white table. it arrived perfectly. make sure you have someone help you put it together. took me about an hour to get it done alone. and it arrived a day early. i love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful coffee table
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful coffee table and great quality for the price. One of the corners was a little chipped but overall, I’m happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Check for damages immediately
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with water damage and had no way to return it for a new one but it looked nice other wise
customer_reviews.author: josh

product_meta.title: Monarch specialties , Coffee Table, Tempered Glass, Glossy White, 44"L
product_meta.description: Color:Glossy WhiteWith a chic glossy white surface, this hollow-core cocktail table gives an exceptional look to any room. The original tempered glass base provides sturdy support as well as a contemporary look. Use this multi-functional table to compliment your living space.
feature_bullets: Adds a modern polished look to any room
Solid and stylish tempered glass legs
